content:
On January 12, the Yangling Experimental Middle School of Shaanxi Normal University was reported to have been shut down by the power supply bureau due to arrears in electricity bills, and the school issued a notice announcing a holiday.
School staff said: The school has not paid wages for three months.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Many netizens also said in the comment section that they and the people around them have been owed wages for several months.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
"Affecting three generations" may become history
On January 11, after the practice of "collective responsibility" was stopped by the National People's Congress, a research report recently made by the Supreme People's Court suggested that the restrictions on the criminals' schooling, employment and social activities should be regulated as a result of the crime, "especially strictly controlling the restrictions and impacts on the relatives of the criminals, and not making restrictions on the relatives of the criminals in schooling, military service, employment, etc. unless necessary."

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On January 11, under a news article titled "The Ministry of Foreign Affairs urges the US to intervene in Taiwan's elections in any way," the netizen with the highest praise said: "We must intervene in the election openly. This is our right. We should set clear standards for candidates. Most importantly, we should send the aircraft carrier over."
The netizen joked, "If you can't even elect a representative for the neighborhood committee next door, don't worry about others. Your rights are that two days off a week is a benefit, and 996 is a universal

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Some netizens said that we should not only focus on unification, but also on the election. Taiwanese people have achieved democracy and freedom, but we should reflect on ourselves.
Some netizens also read the news about Taiwan's election and were curious about the election model in our mainland. Why have we never set up polling stations to call on everyone to vote? We only saw the news reporting who has taken up what position.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On January 11, Hua Rong, a famous financial V, said that due to the sluggish stock market, investors suffered heavy losses, and some investors lost control of their emotions and maliciously abused the country and state officials in the V comment area, which led to many Vs being banned. In order to protect his Weibo, he decided to temporarily close the Weibo comment function and reopen it after the market rebounds to above 3,000 points. 
This Weibo post has been deleted.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
January 12, Xi'an, Shaanxi.
A netizen posted a video saying that Ma Moumou, secretary of the second community of Handu Xinyuan in Weiyang District, not only insulted the community residents, but also poured hot water on them.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On January 12, villagers in Dabai Village, Handian Town, Zouping City, Binzhou City, Shandong Province reported that village cadres recently issued a notice in the village group, requiring wheat growers to pay wheat insurance in the next two days, 6 yuan per mu. The notice also stated that the superiors arranged that if they did not pay the insurance, they would not be able to report the wheat subsidy. This caused dissatisfaction among some villagers.
A staff member of the Handian Town Government introduced that a policy has indeed been introduced to encourage farmers to voluntarily purchase wheat insurance. Insurance is purchased voluntarily, and wheat subsidies are directly distributed to villagers.

content: January 12, Zhuhai, Guangdong. Lesheng Medical has been in arrears of wages for workers for two years, and the workers sat on the roof and jumped off the building to demand their wages.

content: On January 11, it was reported online that the village party secretary of Liantangtou Village, Weidi Town, Luoding City, Yunfu City, Guangdong Province, beat up a disabled elderly person in the village.

content: On January 13, a Youth League Committee teacher at Jiangxi University of Finance and Economics told students not to play dead and to do it quickly because they had not completed the "big study" and prohibited them from taking screenshots and forwarding them.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
January 12, Kangding, Sichuan. The Sichuan-Tibet Second Project Department of the China Railway 12th Bureau Second Engineering Co., Ltd. in Kangding City owed wages to migrant workers. After repeated requests for payment, the workers had no choice but to hold up banners to demand their wages.
The person who filmed the video said that no one in the company could solve the problem, and that the Labor Bureau had no results.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
At present, due to the restriction of the flow of topics related to the "Taiwan election", netizens have used "Dongsuan" (Taiwanese for elected) to replace their speeches.
Many little pinks called for military reunification, called for the dissolution of the Taiwan Affairs Office of the State Council, and called for the severance of the ECFA Cross-Strait Economic Cooperation Framework Agreement
Some people also lamented that watching the Taiwan election was very exciting, and thinking back, the only time they voted in their life was to elect a primary school class monitor.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:

Many netizens accused Weibo of using the "Weibo Night" awards ceremony to dilute the news of the Taiwan election.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Just now, Chen Binhua, spokesman for the Taiwan Affairs Office of the State Council, said on the evening of the 13th about the results of the Taiwan election:
The results of the two elections in Taiwan show that the Democratic Progressive Party cannot represent the mainstream public opinion on the island. Taiwan is China's Taiwan. This election cannot change the basic pattern and development direction of cross-strait relations, nor can it change the common desire of compatriots on both sides of the strait to get closer and closer, and it cannot stop the general trend that the motherland will eventually be unified and will inevitably be unified.
Our position on resolving the Taiwan issue and completing national reunification is consistent, and our will is as firm as a rock. We will adhere to the "1992 Consensus" that embodies the one-China principle, resolutely oppose "Taiwan independence" separatist activities and external interference, and work with relevant political parties, groups and people from all walks of life in Taiwan to promote cross-strait exchanges and cooperation, deepen cross-strait integration and development, jointly promote Chinese culture, promote the peaceful development of cross-strait relations, and advance the great cause of national reunification.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
All accounts reporting on "Statement by the Taiwan Affairs Office Spokesperson on the results of the Taiwan election" have turned on "selected comments".
Those who forgot to turn on the selection are being attacked.
